title: Facebook - Best of Coast to Coast AM - 10/26/21
itunes:title: Facebook - Best of Coast to Coast AM - 10/26/21
description:
George Noory and authors Kent Heckenlively and Ryan Hartwig review Hartwig's time as a content moderator for Facebook reviewing social media posts for controversial content, and how recent revelations of internal bias are hurting the future of the company.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com
